content.body:
### Shop 225/65R16 Tire Size 
The 225/65R16 tires are fitted to passenger cars, CUVs, SUVs, minivans, and light trucks, and are available in various tire types such as All-Season, Winter, Performance, Touring, Summer, Highway, All-Weather, and Ultra-High-Performance. If you drive a Chrysler Town & Country, Dodge Caravan, Nissan Quest, RAM C/V, or Volkswagen Routan, then you might have 225/65R16 tires, and a new version of any of these vehicles might’ve rolled out of the factory with a set of Yokohama AVID S33, [Bridgestone Turanza EL400-02](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/turanza-el400-02), or Yokohama AVID C33 tires attached.

Popular vehicles
2008-2010 Chrysler Town & Country 
2008-2013  Dodge Grand Caravan
2004-2017 Nissan Quest
2012-2015 RAM C/V
2009-2014 Volkswagen Routan

All-season tires are the most common tires on the road thanks to their good handling and traction in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Consider the[Pirelli P4 Four Seasons Plus](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/p4-four-seasons-plus#v=1&tireSize=225-65r16&mpn=2621400&pageSource=sizeCatalog&itemId=164455&curationSource=none&productPos=16), Kumho Solus TA11, and Yokohama Avid Ascend LX if you need a 225/65R16 sized all-season tire for year-round traction.

Winter tires are made for good handling and performance on conditions like snow, ice, slush and even cold, and dry asphalt. Check out the [Bridgestone Blizzak WS90](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/blizzak-ws80#v=1&tireSize=225-65r16&mpn=013414&pageSource=sizeCatalog&itemId=102480&curationSource=none&productPos=13), Continental VikingContact 7, and General Altimax Arctic 12 if you need a 225/65R16 sized winter tire that can deliver excellent performance during the winter season.

Whether you need an all-season, winter, or any other type of tire, SimpleTire has a set of 225/65R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
